TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProxyGenerator extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ProxyGenerator.GetClientProxyScript%2A> method to retrieve the ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that is used to generate the proxy class for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> attribute applied.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientProxyScript (Type type, string path, bool debug);
.method public static hidebysig string GetClientProxyScript(class System.Type type, string path, bool debug) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the object to obtain the script for.
to include XML code comments; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ProxyGenerator.GetClientProxyScript%2A> method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> attribute applied. The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class. When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute> attribute applied. If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] or other development environments. As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.

Docs.exception: The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientProxyScript (Type type, string path, bool debug, System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint);
.method public static hidebysig string GetClientProxyScript(class System.Type type, string path, bool debug, class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the object to obtain the script for.
to include XML code comments; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type using the path and service end point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ProxyGenerator.GetClientProxyScript%2A> method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> attribute applied. The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class. When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute> attribute applied. If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] or other development environments. As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.

Docs.exception: The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.
